        public void serialize​(com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonGenerator gen,
                      RequestCtx ctx)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Serialize the response by setting the appropriate HTTP response headers (from RequestCtx) and generating a JSON body response if required (e.g. for SCIM Errors HTTP Status 400).
        Specified by:
        serialize in interface ScimSerializer
        Parameters:
        gen - A JsonGenerator object usually bound to an HttpResponse object writer.
        ctx - A RequestCtx object containing the original request/response.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - may be thrown when attempting to write to generator

      • applyAciSet

        public void applyAciSet​(AciSet set)
        Applies a given ACI to the results. It looks at the rights and targetAttr specifications and removes attributes which are not returnable.
        Parameters:
        set - The AciSet to be applied.
